alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Jackson; Lincoln; Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 11:32PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, Union, west central Ouachita, eastern Claiborne, northeastern Bienville and Lincoln Parishes through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1132 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Junction City to 7 miles southwest of Bernice to 8 miles south of Arcadia. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ruston, Grambling, Farmerville, Arcadia, Bernice, Gibsland, Cooley, Dubach, Choudrant, Simsboro, Marion, Junction City, Vienna, Athens, Lisbon, Downsville, Spearsville, Lillie, Bryceland and Mount Lebanon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern Louisiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central Arkansas...and north central and northwestern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Claiborne; Jackson; Lincoln; Ouachita; Union
